testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`pg`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT DISTINCT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg.num = 1 AND pg.name = 'page 1' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause, LIKE. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`spans`) = 2 AND v.index_projection.entry_keys = [0,1,2,3,5] AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`pg`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT DISTINCT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg.num IN [1,2] AND pg.name LIKE 'page %' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause, OR. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`spans`) = 2 AND v.index_projection.entry_keys = [0,2,3,5] AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`pg`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT DISTINCT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND (pg.num = 1 OR pg.num = 2) AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause, AND, OR. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`spans`) = 2 AND v.index_projection.entry_keys = [0,1,2,3,5] AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`pg`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT DISTINCT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg.num >= 1 AND (pg.name = 'page 1' OR pg.name = 'page 2') AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause (addittional predicate). No Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT DISTINCT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg.num = 1 AND pg.name = 'page 1' AND pg.xyz IS MISSING AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause(different bindings). Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`pg1`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch1.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch1 UNNEST ch1.pages AS pg1 WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg1.num = 1 AND pg1.name = 'page 1' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause(reverse bindings). Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, pg.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS pg UNNEST pg.pages AS ch WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch.num = 1 AND ch.name = 'page 1' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause. Index Aggregation. ORDER, OFFSET, LIMIT, Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND v.index_group_aggs IS NOT MISSING AND v.`limit` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`offset` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT pg.num, COUNT(1) AS cnt, COUNT(DISTINCT pg.name) AS dcnt FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg.num >= 1 AND f.isbn >= 1 GROUP BY pg.num ORDER BY pg.num DESC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause. No Index ORDER. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND v.index_order IS MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`pg`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10un' END

statements: SELECT DISTINCT pg.num, META(f).id FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch UNNEST ch.pages AS pg WHERE f.type = 'book' AND pg.num >= 1 AND f.isbn <= 1 ORDER BY pg.num DESC, f.isbn LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1
